div.p: >> WE KNOW THAT WAS USED TO PERSUADE ALL OF US THAT

BUT MY QUESTION FOR MR. HALL IS WHEN DID HILL EVER BEAT ME?

MAYBE I WAS OFF THAT NIGHT. >> A CONSTITUTION FOR FIFTH
